articles.title: US deficit poses 'significant risks' to global economy, warns IMF - Financial Times
articles.description: Fund also cites concerns over fiscal ‘imbalances’ in UK, China and Italy
articles.content:
The IMF has warned the US that its massive fiscal deficits have stoked inflation and pose significant risks for the global economy.

articles.title: Elon Musk says Tesla needs a 'complete organizational overhaul' - Business Insider
articles.description: "That said, our executive tenure is unusually high at well over 10 years at Tesla," Musk wrote on X.
articles.content:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk has said the electric-vehicle giant needs to do a "complete organizational overhaul to reach the next level" every "half decade or so."

articles.title: US to grow at double the rate of G7 peers this year, says IMF - Financial Times
articles.description: Fund also upgrades inflation forecasts as strong demand and tight labour market delay possible Fed rate cuts
